languages.text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.
languages.original_text: Получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, Убеждения, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Убеждения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Убеждения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: 所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

traits.locale_text: 进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}检定时，承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が-20課せられる。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}の判定に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−20 効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合、ヴォイドシップに行くと解除できる。

languages.text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 para cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

traits.locale_text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 para cualquier prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -20 für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Wurde er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

traits.locale_text: Jeder aufaddierte Effekt führt zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf jede Probe für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.

traits.locale_text: Subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20 sur les tests d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g}. L'effet se dissipe à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour le faire disparaître.

languages.text: Her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verir. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove it.
